title: How to Make a Mozzarella Sandwich

steps.headline: Slice two pieces of cheese sourdough bread.
Chop up the garlic cloves to tiny pieces and stuff them into the garlic bread.
Toast the two slices of bread
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar on one slice of bread.
Put sliced tomato, fresh mozzarella, and basil on the one slice.
Put balsamic vinegar and olive oil on the other slice.

text: Slice two pieces of cheese sourdough bread.  Peel the garlic. you will need two cloves. Chop up the garlic cloves to tiny pieces and stuff them into the garlic bread.  Toast the two slices of bread  Drizzle olive oil and balsamic vinegar on one slice of bread.  Put sliced tomato, fresh mozzarella, and basil on the one slice.  Put balsamic vinegar and olive oil on the other slice.  Put the slices together.  Consume.
